I did swim with them off the coast of the Big Island. The state tightly regulates how many boats can take out swimmers and how close you can get. They are not stressed at all. A mom and calf swam within 6 feet of my wife and daughter. Most of them stayed 25-30 feet away. They are intelligent and very curious. Too many animal rights people have their underwear on too tight.
You can never argue with ignorance !

He was forced to cut a check there on the spot. He doent care about us Veterans he cares about himself, you Trump Supporters are being duped. I would have done the same thing. I had an amnio in 1989. If something had been wrong, I would have terminated the pregnancy. I did not want my older 2 kids to have to perhaps eventually have to take care of a child with disabilities because Mom decided to wear a """"badge of honor"""". Sorry, folks, but that's what a lot of you ladies sound like when putting down someone that made a personal decision to terminate a pregnancy. Like somehow, you are special and deserve some medal because you made YOUR personal decision to continue with your pregnancy and anything otherwise is wrong because you have determined it to be so. That decision to have your child is yours, just like it was her decision to terminate. Her decision did not affect you in any way, so why make it personal.
Congrats & God bless them both with continuous good health & love!
obama is not worth the air he breathes
